_sText:
This map is a map that is mainly based on design, under the gamemode bhop since its more aesthetic. The map provides a fun gameplay on scroll aswell as autobhop, with a bonus added for extra entertainment.

Really happy to release this block jumping map to the public, i'm keen to leave it as is, feel free to Port this map to cs;go if you please.

I want to say thank you to my friends who helped with anything I needed help with (their names are provided in the author section) you guys were a massive help!

Take a look at this video, it shows majority of my map design and leaves behind a story of makmak trying to escape this map.
sorry but you can't escape without leaving the server or changing the map...



Please enjoy this map.
